item.title: 3.4 Edit Device
item.description: Edit Device # To start Edit and configure the device, the user selects Manage > Device Click on Edit of that device, the following dialog box will appear: 1. Basic # Device information: IMEI: Device identification number. (No editing allowed). Account: Your username/username. (No editing allowed). Icon: Click on the box right below to select the icon of the vehicle/vehicle in which you install the device.
